spells.name: Ablative Barrier
spells.description: Surrounds the target with layers of force.

spells.name: Chain of Perdition
spells.description: Creates a floating chain of force.

spells.name: Darkvision, Communal
spells.description: As darkvision, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Flash Fire
spells.description: Ammunition in the targeted firearm creates a tremendous flash capable of blinding the weapon's bearer and those around him.

spells.name: Healing Thief
spells.description: You siphon half of all magical healing that the targeted creature receives.

spells.name: Hostile Levitation
spells.description: Levitates the targeted creature up off the ground.

spells.name: Locate Weakness
spells.description: You roll damage twice when you roll damage for a critical hit and take the best damage.

spells.name: Pellet Blast
spells.description: Creates an explosion of conjured metal pellets.

spells.name: Phantom Driver
spells.description: Conjures a phantom to drive vehicles.

spells.name: Protection from Arrows, Communal
spells.description: As protection from arrows, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Pup Shape
spells.description: Transforms a single animal or magical beast into a younger and cuter version of itself for a short period of time.

spells.name: Resinous Skin
spells.description: You gain DR 5/piercing and +4 to CMD against disarm attempts.

spells.name: Resist Energy, Communal
spells.description: As resist energy, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Returning Weapon, Communal
spells.description: As returning weapon, but you may divide the duration among weapons touched.

spells.name: Share Language, Communal
spells.description: As share language, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Spider Climb, Communal
spells.description: As spider climb, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Touch Injection
spells.description: You can deliver an infusion, elixir, poison, or potion as a touch attack.
